name: form-submit.toml
rawContent:
[event]
id = "form.submit"
name = "Form Submit"
description = "User submitted a form"
category = "form"

[trigger]
action = "submit"
element = "Form element"

[[payload]]
name = "formId"
type = "string"
description = "Form identifier"

[[payload]]
name = "formName"
type = "string"
description = "Human-readable form name"

[[payload]]
name = "success"
type = "boolean"
description = "Whether submission was successful"

[relations]
components = ["form"]
